message: Is it possible to assign categories or tags to a page and have a categories index created?
And also to have those categories/tags output on the page itself.
There is some support for this in the middleman-blog extension: https://github.com/tdreyno/middleman-blog
Do you know of any examples? Looking at the code in feature.rb I think I can probably work it out, but a demo would make life easier
This *should* be up to date: https://github.com/matt-hh/mm-blog-demo
Ah brilliant. That's just the ticket and gives me plenty to go on. Thanks Thomas and also to Matt. :-)
Would love some assistance as we polish off the extension and prepare to officially support it. Thoughts and feature requests appreciated.
I've made a start and will feed back as I go
